commands.name: generate-favicon
commands.title: Generate Favicon
commands.subtitle: Helps you generate favicon for your website.

commands.name: check-favicon
commands.title: Check Favicon
commands.subtitle: Check favicons on your website
commands.description: Check if your website's favicons are properly configured

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
